name: gtbc-employee-tracker
description: ****************************************** What would you like to do?    * Add        - Department          - ID, Name        - Roles         - ID, Title, Salary, Department        - Employees         - First Name, Last Name, Role, Manager    * View       - Department         > Displays Name, total Cost        - Roles          > Displays Title, Salary, Department        - Employees          - By Manager            > Display all Employees under manager         - All            > Displays all Employees    * Update        - Department        - Roles        - Employees
